title: Client Onboarding - Setup in PSA
description: A new client needs to be set up in the Professional Services Automation (PSA) tool.

tasks.description: Create a new company record for the client in the PSA.
Add all of the client's users as contacts under the company record.
Create the recurring service contract in the PSA, specifying the services provided and the monthly fee.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client's contract is set up correctly for future billing and SLA tracking.
